name: Mirror Mixup (itch)
description:
Currently 'Pay Want You Want' : D

Nearly scrapped this one as it was over-insanely difficult but then realised it needed those black outlines to clearly mark linked pieces and the game just kind of came together. Impossible mode is impossible, don't even try it : P

Mirror Mixup is a picture puzzle game with a fun twist, levels are solved by selecting areas of a picture and rotating them horizontally or vertically. Although each level is mixed up using just 3-6 moves, you'll find it a challenge to restore these pictures. Luckily you can view the completed picture and see which pieces are right or wrong at any time.

The game features three game modes with 125 levels to solve. There are 200 extended bonus levels to unlock and a random mode which gives you a brand new level every time you play.
